mispricing.question: Gap between price and fair value?

capitalization_drag.probability_proxy_note: Configurable indicators of >80% approval probability (e.g., CMC-only CRL resubmission, clearly positive AdCom vote, prior EMA approval).
capitalization_drag.note: Apply only to PDUFA. Use when market cap < $750M AND approval probability proxy indicates >80%. Apply run-up penalty if T-90 return exceeds threshold.

pdufa.note: Form 483 with OAI at manufacturing site reduces confidence. EMA approval shows regulatory precedent (91-98% concordance).

wolf_pack.definition: Two or more activist signals within 60 days (e.g., 13D filings or public letters).

activist.note: Tiering updated for 2020-2025 data. DSO divergence >20% vs peers indicates harder operational fix, reduces activist success probability.

merger_arb.note: Second request: 35-45% abandonment rate. China-connected buyer: elevated regulatory risk and abandonment.

spinoff.note: WARN filing signals operational distress at SpinCo. Reduce position size by 50%, not a score penalty.

note: Base score from filters (max 11), then apply archetype adjustments
